description: Create, Update or Destory a Url_Map. See U(https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/load-balancing/http/url-map) for an overview. More details on the Url_Map API can be found at U(https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/reference/latest/urlMaps#resource).

default_service.description: Default Backend Service if no host rules match.

host_rules.description: The list of HostRules to use against the URL. Contains a list of hosts and an associated path_matcher.

path_matchers.description: The list of named PathMatchers to use against the URL. Contains path_rules, which is a list of paths and an associated service. A default_service can also be specified for each path_matcher.
